title: What time is The X Factor: Celebrity on tonight?
text:
Simon is among the judges for the show (Picture: Syco/Thames TV/PA Wire)

The wait for the first episode of The X Factor: Celebrity is almost over.

In just a few short hours, celebrities from all walks of life will be going head-to-head in a singing competition to see who has the most impressive pipes.

Here’s what you need to know about where and what time to tune in…

What time is X Factor: Celebrity on tonight?

X Factor: Celebrity is on tonight, 12 October, at 8:35pm

You’ll be able to catch the action on ITV until 10:05pm.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

The likes of Glee’s Kevin McHale, reality star Megan McKenna and EastEnders’ Jonny Labey will all be competing in the Unders category during the course of the season.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Meanwhile journalist Martin Bashir, actress Victoria Ekanoye and talk show host Ricki Lake are just some of the stars who will be competing in the Overs category.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

On top of that, we’ll be treated to performances from celebrity supergroups like The Islanders, which will be made up of Love Island alums Eyal Booker, Samira Mighty, Zara Mcdermott and Wes Nelson.

On top of that, Hollyoaks star Jeremy Edwards and Strictly dancer Brendan Cole have joined forces and will be peforming as Cole and Edwards.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

The X Factor: Celebrity contestants OVERS Journalist: Martin Bashir Talk Show host: Ricki Lake Quiz show champion: Jenny Ryan Actress: Victoria Ekanoye UNDERS Reality star: Megan McKenna Model and Actress: Hayley Hasselhoff Soap star: Jonny Labey Film star: Olivia Olson Actor: Kevin McHale GROUPS The Islanders: Samira Mighty, Zara McDermott, Wes Nelson and Eyal Booker Try Star: Ben Foden, Thom Evans and Levi Davis Cole and Edwards: Brendan Cole and Jeremy Edwards Social Media Stars and CBBC Presenters Max and Harvey V5: Sofia, Alondra, Laura, Wendii and Natalie

The X Factor Celebrity launches on ITV Saturday 12 October at 8.35pm.
